name: Solve Intelligence
headline: AI patent drafting, prosecution, harvesting and more for legal teams.
description:
We provide an in-browser document editor that any patent attorney can start using straight away. It works just like Google Docs but, under the hood, is powered by an AI copilot to help the attorney draft, prosecute, and harvest high-quality patents efficiently.

Our product can help with all stages of the patent life cycle, from drafting and filing to prosecution and opposition.

founders.name: Chris Parsonson, Founder
founders.description: Chris did his PhD in machine learning at UCL, publishing and winning awards in top AI conferences and journals. He holds an MRes from the University of Cambridge and an MEng from Imperial College London. Prior to founding Solve Intelligence, Chris worked at leading tech organisations, including The Alan Turing Institute, InstaDeep, and Dyson.

founders.name: Sanj Ahilan, Founder
founders.description: Sanj completed his PhD in machine learning at UCL, won awards at top AI conferences, and developed popular open-source code for fine-tuning large language models. Before founding Solve Intelligence, he worked at Magic Carpet AI and Huawei Technologies. He holds an MSci in Physics from the University of Cambridge.

founders.name: Angus Parsonson, Founder
founders.description: Angus completed his MEng degree in computer science at the University of Bristol, during which he received a cyber security scholarship from GCHQ. He has since worked as a Quantitative Developer at Coremont LLP, a spin-off from hedge fund Brevan Howard.

# Write patents with AI
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65032808442beb3113d40663/65f18e4e48e01093c77137c8_write.svg)
We use AI to help legal professionals write high-quality patents efficiently. We do this by providing an in-browser document editor that you can start using straight away.
We use AI to help legal professionals write high-quality patents efficiently. We do this by providing an in-browser document editor that you can start using straight away.

## Ensure complete confidentiality.
## Testimonials
### [No AI model training.No data you upload to or output from the product is ever used for training any AI model of any kind.](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<#>)### [No third-party monitoring.Neither Solve nor any third party stores or monitors your data; everything issandboxed to you.](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<#>)### [State-of-the-art encryption.All data is encrypted in transit and stored on enterprise servers with AES-256 and TLS 1.3 encryption.](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<#>)### [Industry-leading certification.Solve adheres to the highest security standards with SOC 2, GDPR, CCPA, and ISO 42001 certification.](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<#>)
[Security Portal](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<https:/solveintelligence.wolfia.com/>)
## Work smarter, not harder.
The Solve Intelligence Copilot has been specialized for IP, leveraging the world's best patents to ensure high-quality output. You can quickly configure the AI to draft in your specific style, enabling customization for different fields, clients, and regions.Instantly deploy our enterprise-ready generative AI into your workflow and immediately expand the capacity of your IP team.
[Request Demo](https://www.solveintelligence.com/</contact-us>)
[Book Free Demo](https://www.solveintelligence.com/</contact-us>)
[View Video](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<#>)
## Work smarter, not harder
## Choose where you leverage AI.
Our core philosophy is to keep you in the driving seat. Every part of our product has been built to be highly interactive and flexible. You can use AI as much or as little as you like throughout the patent application process.
[Request Demo](https://www.solveintelligence.com/</contact-us>)
[Book Free Demo](https://www.solveintelligence.com/</contact-us>)
[View Video](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<#>)
## Choose where you leverage AI
## Unparalleled return on investment.
Our product is being used by IP firms across the US, Europe, and Asia, with customers reporting 60-90% patent drafting efficiency improvements.
[Request Demo](https://www.solveintelligence.com/</contact-us>)
[Book Free Demo](https://www.solveintelligence.com/</contact-us>)
[View Video](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<#>)
## Unparalleled return on investment
## Ensure complete confidentiality.
We take security and confidentiality extremely seriously - that's why we are trusted by IP firms across four continents. No data you upload to or output from our product is ever used for training any AI model. Everything is encrypted; neither we nor any third-party can view your data.
[Request Demo](https://www.solveintelligence.com/</contact-us>)
[Book Free Demo](https://www.solveintelligence.com/</contact-us>)
[View Video](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<#>)

Brian Detwiler
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65032808442beb3113d40663/65a9bb129bbd435db4c57057_linkedin.svg)](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/brian-detwiler-41854023/>)
Scale LLP
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65032808442beb3113d40663/65a9bb67fb9b79d18cf801f1_link.svg)](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<https:/www.scalefirm.com/>)
'I have used Solve's Patent Copilot for a half dozen patent applications. With each successive project, my final deliverable gets even better. I can spend more time focusing on what needs to be said (e.g., solid background, alternative embodiments, correct scoping) rather than how to get words onto paper. My work has become more strategic and analytical and less wheel-spinning, which ultimately leads to better patent applications.'
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65032808442beb3113d40663/65a9c0945314d583b6d75ae7_unnamed.png)
Ryan Chen
Courage IP
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65032808442beb3113d40663/65a9bb67fb9b79d18cf801f1_link.svg)](https://www.solveintelligence.com/<https:/courageip.com.tw/>)
‘I recently handled a case using Solve Intelligence’s product and discovered that all I needed to do was paste the verbatim transcript (nearly three hours worth) of my discussion with the client. The AI was then able to grasp the key points of the technology and write good-quality claims, even though a large part of the recording was a casual conversation. It feels truly magical.’

Partner, Meitar

‘At Meitar Patents, we constantly seek tools that enhance our team’s ability to deliver exceptional results for our clients. Solve Intelligence’s tool offers a unique combination of advanced AI capabilities and user-centric design, which aligns perfectly with our vision of using AI.’

## Ensure complete confidentiality.
## Testimonials
### No AI model training.No data you upload to or output from the product is ever used for training any AI model of any kind.⟨12⟩### No third-party monitoring.Neither Solve nor any third party stores or monitors your data; everything issandboxed to you.⟨12⟩### State-of-the-art encryption.All data is encrypted in transit and stored on enterprise servers with AES-256 and TLS 1.3 encryption.⟨12⟩### Industry-leading certification.Solve adheres to the highest security standards with SOC 2, GDPR, CCPA, and ISO 42001 certification.⟨12⟩
Security Portal⟨13⟩
## Work smarter, not harder.
The Solve Intelligence Copilot has been specialized for IP, leveraging the world's best patents to ensure high-quality output. You can quickly configure the AI to draft in your specific style, enabling customization for different fields, clients, and regions.Instantly deploy our enterprise-ready generative AI into your workflow and immediately expand the capacity of your IP team.

generated_description:
**Solve Intelligence: Revolutionizing Patent Drafting Through AI**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S23, Solve Intelligence is reshaping the landscape of patent law with its cutting-edge AI technology. The mission? To streamline the entire patent lifecycle for legal teams, making the process of drafting, prosecuting, and harvesting patents not just more efficient, but also more intelligent.

**What They Offer**

At its core, Solve Intelligence provides a user-friendly, in-browser document editor that patent attorneys can dive into immediately. Think of it as the Google Docs of patent drafting, but with an AI copilot that enhances the user’s capabilities. This tool is tailored to assist with every phase of the patent process—from initial drafting and filing to prosecution and opposition.

**Efficiency Meets Customization**

Their product stands out by not only increasing drafting efficiency—users report improvements of 60-90%—but also allowing for a high degree of customization based on specific legal requirements, styles, and regional nuances. This adaptability means that legal professionals can focus more on the substance of their patents and less on the mechanical aspects of writing.

**Security First**

With so much sensitive information at stake, Solve Intelligence doesn’t take security lightly. Their platform adheres to strict regulations and certifications, including SOC 2 and GDPR. Notably, they never train their AI on user data, ensuring absolute confidentiality and peace of mind for legal teams.

**A Growing Team**

Operating out of an unnamed location, Solve Intelligence is small yet mighty with a team of nine and guided by Group Partner Tom Blomfield. Their collective experience and passion drive the continuous evolution of their product, bringing new features on a regular basis that further enhance workflow and patent quality.

**Feedback from the Field**

The testimonials from users speak volumes. Legal professionals have described the platform as "incredibly powerful" and a "game changer," highlighting how it allows them to reclaim valuable time and improve the quality of their outputs.

For those looking to stay competitive in the fast-evolving world of patent law, Solve Intelligence is a tool well worth exploring. Whether you're drafting a fresh patent or navigating complex legal waters, having AI as a copilot can make a world of difference. 

Discover more about their technology and request a demo at [Solve Intelligence's website](https://www.solveintelligence.com).
